participant_1.background:
I love pizza, especially when I'm with my friends.
I would brag about my climbing skills and all the amazing places I've been able to go because of them.
my favorite meal is chicken and rice.
I value my car because it allows me to be independent and travel wherever I want.
i have 3 ex wives.

participant_2.background:
I am going to take a yoga class to stay in shape and work on my Swedish.
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows.
I have always loved roses so the first thing I remember buying was a rose bush for my garden.
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.

content.text: Hello, what are you up to today?
Hello! I am going to take a yoga class to stay in shape and work on my Swedish. What are you up to?
I am going to go rock climbing with some friends. I love it because it gets me outside and I can see beautiful views.
That sounds really fun! I have always wanted to try rock climbing.
You should! It is a lot of fun and a great way to get in shape.
I will have to try it sometime.
You should! I am sure you would love it.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to swim in the lake. I know it is a little weird, but I love the feeling of the water on my skin.
That does not sound weird at all! I love swimming too.
Awesome! We should go swimming together sometime.
That would be fun! I am free this weekend.
I am free too! Let's do it!
